modules/book/book-node-export-html.tpl.php File Reference


Variables

print $node nid
print $depth
print $title
print $content
print $children

Detailed Description

Default theme implementation for rendering a single node in a printer friendly outline.

See also:
book-node-export-html.tpl.php Where it is collected and printed out.
Available variables:
  • $depth: Depth of the current node inside the outline.
  • $title: Node title.
  • $content: Node content.
  • $children: All the child nodes recursively rendered through this file.

See also:
template_preprocess_book_node_export_html()
